calculateRatio(uint256,uint256).details: calculate the ratio of CDS Pool/Eth Vault

depositToAaveProtocol().details: deposit the eth in our protocol to Aave

depositToCompoundProtocol().details: deposit the eth in our protocol to Compound

depositTokens(uint128,uint64,uint8,uint6.details: This function takes ethPrice, depositTime, percentageOfEth and receivedType parameters to deposit eth into the contract and mint them back the AMINT tokens.

params._depositTime: get unixtime stamp at the time of deposit
params._strikePrice: strike price which the user opted

getUSDValue().details: get the usd value of ETH

liquidate(address,uint64,uint64).details: This function liquidate ETH which are below downside protection.

params._user: The address to whom to liquidate ETH.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateLastEthVaultValue(uint256).details: update the last eth vault value

params._toAddress: The address to whom to transfer ETH.

withdrawFromAaveProtocol(uint64).details: withdraw the eth from aave which were already deposited

withdrawFromCompoundProtocol(uint64).details: withdraw the eth from Compound which were already deposited
